Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01>This training is tough, but it's worth the
pain knowing each moment of preparation
will help me aid King Sidon and you!
BlackZelda_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I made a lot of friends after leaving the
domain and coming here.

<snd:Humming_01>I met Rito, Gorons, Gerudo, <sp:5:0:0>and also
Hylians.<sp:5:0:0> I will do my very best to protect
them all.
BlackZelda_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat>There are folks from all over Hyrule
gathered at this fort.

If we can all join our strength together,
we have nothing to fear.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Unconscious_00>Urgh... <sp:5:1:0>Argh... <sp:5:1:0>If only that sludge would
stop falling.
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Is it true that Princess Zelda has
been found?
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Painful>Urgh... <sp:5:1:0>Urp!<sp:5:1:0> My health...<sp:5:0:0>is suffering a
great deal.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I had never left Zora's Domain before this,
so living here feels very new to me.

<snd:LaughS>It is interesting...even if I do have to train
all day.
